verses.esv: 21 And this commandment we have from him: whoever loves God must also love his brother.
verses.kjv: 21 And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth God love his brother also.
verses.niv: 21 And he has given us this command: Whoever loves God must also love his brother.

verses.esv: 15 that whoever believes in him may have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 15 That whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have eternal life.
verses.niv: 15 that everyone who believes in him may have eternal life.

verses.esv: 15 Everyone who hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life abiding in him.
verses.kjv: 15 Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer: and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him.
verses.niv: 15 Anyone who hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life in him.
